article_title: Care access similar for those with ACA coverage, employer plans
article_text:
Free Health Payer Daily Newsletter More than 38,000 health plan executives read FierceHealthPayer to stay current on trends in healthcare payment reform, cost containment strategies, the ICD-9/ICD-10 transition, fraud prevention, and more. Sign up for FREE today!

Click here to see a sample.

article_metadata.description: Individuals who are covered through Affordable Care Act marketplace plans are just as likely to have access to needed care as those who have employer-based coverage and more likely than those who are uninsured, according to new survey data compiled by the Urban Institute and Robert Wood Johnson Foundation.

og.description: Individuals who are covered through Affordable Care Act marketplace plans are just as likely to have access to needed care as those who have employer-based coverage and more likely than those who are uninsured, according to new survey data compiled by the Urban Institute and Robert Wood Johnson Foundation.
